award_title: Collaborative Research: Harnessing entropy to discover new chalcogenide semiconductors
subject: Making your chalcogenide work accessible
body:
Hi James,

I came across your NSF work on discovering new chalcogenide semiconductors â€“ really cool that you're tackling the synthesis bottleneck experimentally and computationally.

I'm building Ouro, a platform for sharing computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable, not just a zip file in supplementary materials. For grant reports and broader impact statements, it makes demonstrating real-world use pretty straightforward.

Thought it might be worth exploring for your group. Would love to hear if this could be useful for you.

Best
